Package org.concordion.api.extension

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConcordionExtender
    Allows ConcordionExtensions to add features to Concordion.
    ConcordionExtension
    Supplements Concordion behaviour by adding new commands, listeners or output enhancements.
    ConcordionExtensionFactory
    Creates an extension for use within Concordion.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Extension
    Marks fields to be added to Concordion as extensions.
    Extensions
    Defines a list of classes to be added to Concordion as extensions.
